API_HASH.description: Get API_HASH from my.telegram.org, used for telethon based modules.

API_ID.description: Get API_ID from my.telegram.org, used for telethon based modules.

AUTHORIZED_CHATS.description: Fill User ID and Chat ID of you want to authorize for use gdrive /clone command .

CRYPT.description: CRYPT from ( https://gdtot.nl/ ) for gdtot_link clone

ENV.description: Setting this to ANYTHING will enable environment variables. Leave it as it is

GDRIVE_FOLDER_ID.description: This is the folder ID of the Google Drive Folder to which you want to upload all the mirrors.

INDEX_URL.description: Refer to https://gitlab.com/ParveenBhadooOfficial/Google-Drive-Index The URL should not have any trailing '/'.

IS_TEAM_DRIVE.description: Set to 'true' if GDRIVE_FOLDER_ID is from a Team Drive else false or Leave it empty.

PHPSESSID.description: PHPSESSID from ( https://gdtot.nl/ ) for gdtot_link clone

STOP_DUPLICATE.description: If this field is set to true, bot will check file in Drive, if it is present in Drive, downloading or cloning will be stopped.

SUPPORT_CHAT.description: Your Telegram support group username where your users will go and bother you with shit But be like: MyGroupChatUsernameBlah. If this ever points to atrocious support than consider you made an enemy.

TOKEN.description: Your telegram bot token. Get one from telegram BotFather
